features.name: Spotter
features.subtitle: Exercise Library & Form Guide
features.description: Your comprehensive exercise database with detailed form guidance and categorized workout videos. Access thousands of exercises with professional demonstrations and step-by-step instructions to perfect your technique.

steps.title: Browse Exercise Categories
steps.description: Navigate through muscle groups, equipment types, or difficulty levels to find the perfect exercises for your workout.

steps.title: Select Your Exercise
steps.description: Tap on any exercise to view detailed instructions, proper form demonstrations, and common mistakes to avoid.

steps.title: Watch Form Videos
steps.description: Follow along with our professional trainers as they demonstrate perfect form and technique for each movement.

steps.title: Track Your Progress
steps.description: Log sets, reps, and weights directly from the exercise page to monitor your strength gains over time.

steps.title: Create Custom Routines
steps.description: Build personalized workout routines using your favorite exercises and save them for future training sessions.

benefits: Detailed form instructions to prevent injuries
Categorized by muscle groups and equipment

features.name: Locator
features.subtitle: Smart Gym Finder
features.description: Discover the perfect gym near you with our intelligent location service. Find gyms based on equipment availability, user reviews, peak hours, and specialized amenities that match your fitness needs.

steps.title: Set Your Location
steps.description: Allow location access or manually enter your preferred area to search for nearby fitness facilities.

steps.title: Apply Smart Filters
steps.description: Filter gyms by equipment type, ratings, price range, hours of operation, and specific amenities you need.

steps.title: View Detailed Profiles
steps.description: Check gym photos, equipment lists, member reviews, and real-time availability before you visit.

steps.title: Check Live Occupancy
steps.description: See current gym occupancy levels to avoid crowded times and plan your workouts accordingly.

steps.title: Save Your Favorites
steps.description: Bookmark your preferred gyms and get notifications about special offers or schedule changes.

benefits: User reviews and ratings from real members
Photos and virtual tours of facilities
Integration with maps and navigation apps

features.name: RepBot
features.subtitle: AI Fitness Partner
features.description: Meet your intelligent fitness companion that provides personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and motivation. RepBot learns from your progress and adapts recommendations to help you achieve your goals faster.

steps.title: Start a Conversation
steps.description: Simply type or speak your fitness questions, goals, or concerns to begin interacting with RepBot.

steps.title: Share Your Goals
steps.description: Tell RepBot about your fitness objectives, current level, and preferences to receive personalized advice.

steps.title: Get Custom Workouts
steps.description: Receive tailored workout plans that adapt based on your progress, available time, and equipment access.

steps.title: Track Your Progress
steps.description: Log workouts and meals while RepBot analyzes your data to provide insights and adjustments.

steps.title: Stay Motivated
steps.description: Receive personalized encouragement, tips, and reminders to help you stay consistent with your routine.

benefits: Answers to common fitness and nutrition questions
Adapts to your schedule and lifestyle changes

features.name: Dashboard
features.subtitle: Health Analytics Hub
features.description: Your comprehensive health and fitness analytics center that integrates with wearable devices to provide detailed insights into your performance, recovery, and overall wellness trends.

steps.title: Connect Your Devices
steps.description: Sync your fitness trackers, smartwatches, and health apps to automatically import your vital metrics.

steps.title: View Your Overview
steps.description: Get a quick snapshot of your daily activity, workout performance, and key health indicators.

steps.title: Analyze Trends
steps.description: Explore detailed charts and graphs showing your progress over time across various fitness metrics.

steps.title: Set Smart Goals
steps.description: Create achievable targets based on your historical data and receive personalized recommendations.

steps.title: Monitor Recovery
steps.description: Track sleep quality, heart rate variability, and other recovery metrics to optimize your training.

benefits: Integration with multiple fitness wearables and apps
Comprehensive health and fitness metrics tracking
